content:
Hello all,
I have published a basic extension for accessing loogle from vscode (cc: @Joachim Breitner) . This is still very new and limited. I am pretty sure there must be bugs and UX annoyances lurking around. I would be grateful to know what you look like and don't like and what changes you would like to see. There are definitely some rough edges and the UX can definitely be improved.

The extension is called loogle-lean and is available on the marketplace
I would treat this extension as something for brave new explorers to try out rather than a finished product at the moment.
The update from 0.01 > 0.0.2 just changed the visible name. 0.02 > 0.03 adds an option to turn off module names in the search results.
